text: Pok Hong is one of the 41 constituencies in the Sha Tin District in Hong Kong. The constituency returns one district councillor to the Sha Tin District Council, with an election every four years. The Pok Hong constituency is loosely based on Pok Hong Estate, with an estimated population of 16,063. ==Councillors represented== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1994 | rowspan=2| Chan Kwok-tim | Civil Force |- |style="background-color: " | | 2014 | NPP/CF |- |style="background-color: " | | 2015 | rowspan=3| Chiu Chu-pong | Neo Democrats |- | style="background-color: " | | 2016 | Independent |- |style="background-color: " | | 2017 | Community Sha Tin |- |} ==Election results== ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ===1990s=== ==References== Category:Sha Tin Wai Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sha Tin District Council Category:1994 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 1994
